title: Domain Settings
description: Define the bounding box of the desired domain.

title: Period and Parameter Settings
description: Define the time period on which bias correction should be applied (ideally a 30-year period) and the parameter that should be corrected.

title: Files and Directories
description: Define where to find the files and directories needed

title: Advanced Interpolation Settings
description: If you choose inverse distance weights interpolation as interpolation method, you can define some additional settings here.
